articles.author: Gregory Svirnovskiy
articles.title: South Africa’s president jokes about Trump dust-up - Politico
articles.description: Cyril Ramaphosa said he was “bemused” when Trump played a video amplifying claims of persecution against white farmers in South Africa.
articles.content: Ramaphosa and Trumps Oval Office meeting last Wednesday started cordially, before the president ordered the video played and then flipped through images and news reports that he said proved white far… [+1597 chars]

articles.author: Patrick Pester
articles.title: 'Primordial' superplume of deep mantle splitting Africa in two, study suggests - Live Science
articles.description: Researchers have found fresh evidence that Africa is breaking apart because of a deep mantle superplume of hot rock beneath the East African Rift System.
articles.content:
Researchers have found new evidence that a gigantic superplume of hot rock is rising beneath Africa, causing intense volcanic activity and splitting the continent in two.
Geologists have long known … [+4007 chars]
